Container.Name: Javinizer
Container.Overview: A commandline and GUI based PowerShell module used to scrape metadata and sort your local Japanese Adult Video (JAV) files into a media library compatible format. After initial start, manually copy below into extra arguments and remove config, logs below -v '/mnt/user/appdata/Javinizer/config/jvSettings.json':'/config/jvSettings.json':'rw' -v '/mnt/user/appdata/Javinizer/config/jvUncensor.csv':'/config/jvUncensor.csv':'rw' -v '/mnt/user/appdata/Javinizer/logs/jvHistory.csv':'/logs/jvHistory.csv':'rw' -v '/mnt/user/appdata/Javinizer/logs/jvLog.log':'/logs/jvLog.log':'rw' -v '/mnt/user/appdata/Javinizer/config/jvGenres.csv':'/config/jvGenres.csv':'rw' -v '/mnt/user/appdata/Javinizer/config/jvTags.csv':'/config/jvTags.csv':'rw' -v '/mnt/user/appdata/Javinizer/config/jvThumbs.csv':'/config/jvThumbs.csv':'rw'
Container.Description:
A commandline and GUI based PowerShell module used to scrape metadata and sort your local Japanese Adult Video (JAV) files into a media library compatible format.After initial start, manually copy below into extra arguments and remove config, logs below -v '/mnt/user/appdata/Javinizer/config/jvSettings.json':'/config/jvSettings.json':'rw' -v '/mnt/user/appdata/Javinizer/config/jvUncensor.csv':'/config/jvUncensor.csv':'rw' -v '/mnt/user/appdata/Javinizer/logs/jvHistory.csv':'/logs/jvHistory.csv':'rw' -v '/mnt/user/appdata/Javinizer/logs/jvLog.log':'/logs/jvLog.log':'rw' -v '/mnt/user/appdata/Javinizer/config/jvGenres.csv':'/config/jvGenres.csv':'rw' -v '/mnt/user/appdata/Javinizer/config/jvTags.csv':'/config/jvTags.csv':'rw' -v '/mnt/user/appdata/Javinizer/config/jvThumbs.csv':'/config/jvThumbs.csv':'rw'
